articles.description: Former India fast bowler Ashish Nehra feels that while Jasprit Bumrah has impressed him a lot, there are bowlers around the world who, if not better, then are on par with the 28-year-old India quick. | Cricket
articles.content: While expressing delight at Jasprit Bumrahs stellar five-wicket-haul in the Cape Town Test between India and South Africa, former fast bowler Ashish Nehra feels that while the India quick has impress… [+1555 chars]
